Name: Brimstone Manor
About the game: Woo demons or angels in this paranormal romance adventure. Side with Chaos or with Order. Uncover the truth, save the kid, and tame the hellhound. Brimstone Manor is a world of secrets. Magic. Miracles. And a battle between Heaven and Hell… a battle for your heart. Your new home is riddled with secrets, from its forbidden basement to a family dog straight out of Hell. Can you survive being a demon’s nanny? When sparks fly, will you fall for the hunky angel or your mysterious, demonic boss? Brimstone Manor is a 152,000-word interactive novel by Frances Pauli. It's entirely text-based, without graphics or sound effects, and fueled by the vast, unstoppable power of your imagination. Play as male, female, or non-binary; gay, straight, or poly. Choose your love interest. Learn magic. Work miracles. Tame the hellhound. Fly! Befriend or defeat the terrifying demoness. Reveal the truth to the world or keep the paranormal a secret. Defend the demon’s mansion, protect his kid, and discover your heart’s desire.
